ProductInfo.Features:
The Samsung Galaxy Note II SCH-I605 blurs the line between phone and tablet, featuring a 5.5-inch Super AMOLED display, and an advanced stylus.
This device also features stylus-oriented software such as handwriting recognition and multiple exclusive apps for taking notes, sketching, and more.
Other features of the Note II include 8-megapixel camera, 1.6GHz quad-core processor, 4G LTE data, microSD slot, 16GB internal memory, and global roaming capabilities.
Use this device to access thousands of apps, games, movies, books, and music on Google's Play Store.
ProductInfo.Name: Very Good Condition Verizon Samsung Galaxy Note II 16GB in White - International Capabilities
